mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat(chat_num, mem_num, doc_num, chat_reg_date, chat_status, res_num) VALUES(chat_seq.nextval, #{mem_num}, #{doc_num}, SYSDATE, 0, #{res_num})
mapper.select: SELECT chat_num, c.mem_num, c.doc_num, c.chat_reg_date, c.chat_status, res_num, r.res_date, r.res_time, m.mem_name FROM chat c JOIN reservation r USING(res_num) JOIN member m ON (c.doc_num = m.mem_num) WHERE c.mem_num=#{mem_num} ORDER BY c.chat_status, r.res_date ASC, r.res_time ASC

SELECT chat_num, c.mem_num, c.doc_num, c.chat_reg_date, c.chat_status, res_num, r.res_date, r.res_time, m.mem_name FROM chat c JOIN reservation r USING(res_num) JOIN member m ON (c.mem_num = m.mem_num) WHERE c.doc_num=#{mem_num} ORDER BY c.chat_status, r.res_date ASC, r.res_time ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_msg(msg_num, chat_num, msg_content, msg_sender_type, msg_image) VALUES(msg_seq.nextval, #{chat_num}, #{msg_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msg_sender_type}, #{msg_image, jdbcType=BLOB} )

INSERT INTO chat_files (file_num, chat_num, file_name, mem_num, doc_num, file_type, file_valid_date, file_reg_date) VALUES (files_seq.nextval, #{chat_num}, #{file_name}, #{mem_num}, #{doc_num}, #{file_type}, #{file_valid_date}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT f.file_num, f.file_type, f.file_name, f.mem_num, f.doc_num, f.file_reg_date, f.file_valid_date, m.mem_name FROM chat_files f JOIN member m ON(f.doc_num = m.mem_num) WHERE f.chat_num = #{chat_num}
